interaction_summary:
=== Purchase Information ===
Product Title: BOGSEA Dark Brown Wig with Bangs Long Dark Brown Wigs for Women Long Synthetic Wavy Wigs for Daily Party (24Inch,Dark Brown)
Review Date: 2021/06/12
Store: BOGSEA
Average Rating: 3.6
Product Details: {'Material': 'Synthetic', 'Hair Type': 'Wavy', 'Style': 'Modern', 'Brand': 'BOGSEA', 'Age Range (Description)': 'Adult', 'Package Dimensions': '11.97 x 9.09 x 2.83 inches; 10.23 Ounces', 'UPC': '701347548230'}
Review Text: So I felt they did a good job of hiding the weft and had alot of hair. The unit shed pretty bad just by touching it though. The hair was shiney but powder should control that. The length was there. It had one spot near the bangs that looked like someone fried it. And that would be hard to conceal. The bangs looked nicer then most but it just wasn't for me. Fake scalp also not best I've seen but concealer would probably fix that. The top had no volume and I don't mean amount of hair. It was slicked down really tight. I tried to shake it a bit with my fingers to see if it would gain some life but it didn't, plus a bunch of hair fell out.  This super flat look near the fake scalp and with a mid part that cannot be moved is just gonna make me look like the Amish. I would look at this company again if they had a unit without the bangs and maybe a more flexible part. A mini front lace would probably help.
Review Title: Very flat top. Some fried pieces under the wig.
Rating: 3.0
--------------------------------------------------
reference_summary:
Clip in Hair Extensions - Platinum Blonde - Straight - 18in / 46cm - Full Head - 8 Pcs 120g - Japanese Heat Resistant Synthetic Hairpiece - Looks and Feels like Real Hair Elegant Hair {'Brand': 'Elegant Hair', 'Material': 'Human Hair', 'Extension Length': '18 Inches', 'Hair Type': 'Straight', 'Material Feature': 'Natural', 'Is Discontinued By Manufacturer': 'No', 'Product Dimensions': '18 x 38.98 x 0.39 inches; 4.23 Ounces', 'Item model number': 'SCIHLST20920', 'UPC': '799632432838'} fantastic value for fake hair. perfect color. True pale blonde platinum with white like highlights. Great if you bleach your hair!
Very soft. doesnt tangle. blends into your own hair very well. Easy to put on and off. Keep the bag and put them in it when not in use.
Make sure you straighten your own hair first before you put these in because these are SUPER straight! fantastic value for fake hair Elegant Hair - 17" PONYTAIL Clip in Hair Piece CURLY Platinum Blonde #16/60 REVERSIBLE Claw Clip 220g Elegant Hair {'Brand': 'Elegant Hair', 'Material': 'Human Hair', 'Extension Length': '17 Inches', 'Hair Type': 'Curly', 'Material Feature': 'Natural', 'Is Discontinued By Manufacturer': 'No', 'Product Dimensions': '16.93 x 3.94 x 1.97 inches; 5.64 Ounces', 'UPC': '799632434306'} Fantastic! I own the 22inch hair version as well. Both are great but the 22inch one can weight heavy on the head after 6 to 8 hours (and i suffer from migraines so I have to be careful about that) . this 17inch one is lighter but still VERY full. can wear it all day at work with no issues.
Very curly! very beautiful! Looks real! This is elegant HAIR! CAISHA by PRETTYSHOP Hair Donut Up Do Hair Ring Hairstyler Bun Maker Bridal Hairpiece Hair Styling Tool Brown DK2 CAISHA ['Synthetic fiber hair styler. Diameter: 3,6" (9cm); Weight: 0.1 lb (45g). . . .'] {'Color': 'brown #DK2', 'Material': 'Synthetic', 'Brand': 'CAISHA', 'Item Dimensions LxWxH': '9.45 x 7.09 x 1.97 inches', 'Hair Type': 'Straight', 'Is Discontinued By Manufacturer': 'No', 'Product Dimensions': '9.45 x 7.09 x 1.97 inches; 1.41 Ounces', 'Item model number': 'DKxx', 'UPC': '885860274224 716670803819', 'Manufacturer': 'Generic'} More golden in color and it losses shape after a few wears Its okay. More gold then photo Magnetic Eyelashes False Lashes with Magnets Top and Bottom Magnetic Lashes Resuable Lashes 2 Pair / 8pcs Natural Style Cuckoo {'Brand': 'Cuckoo', 'Material': 'synthetic fibers', 'Item Dimensions LxWxH': '5.12 x 4.3 x 0.9 inches', 'Material Feature': 'Natural', 'Item Form': 'Pair', 'Product Dimensions': '5.12 x 4.3 x 0.9 inches; 2.4 Ounces'} The magnet is strong. I bought the two paid sandwich style. I tried the videos, and the hacks that say cut them ...I tried applying with special lash tweezers... Nothing works to get them close to the lash lid. The magnetic is strong so I'm sure it won't fall off, but it's so strong that when you start to move the under lash toward your eye with the upper lash laying on top of your lashes, the magnetic pulls and moves is soil quickly that it always ends up locked half way through your natural lashes. And I'm a contact wearer...so it's not like I have fear of putting stuff near my eyes. These probably will work well with lash liners. The lashes themselves look nicely constructed. It's just the application as intended is impossible. The lashes look beautiful but you'll never get them on ENTRANCED STYLES Straight Black Wig with Bangs for Women Fashion Long Straight Wig Heat Resistant Bangs Synthetic Wig 20 Inch Natural Looking Daily Party Cosplay Wig ENTRANCED STYLES {'Material': 'Synthetic', 'Hair Type': 'Straight', 'Style': 'Modern', 'Brand': 'ENTRANCED STYLES', 'Age Range (Description)': 'Adult', 'Package Dimensions': '10.4 x 6.1 x 2 inches; 3.99 Ounces', 'UPC': '778992677189'} There are better options out there. This had a weird part. The flesh color looks like layers of beige mesh for the scalp and it kind of shimmers like pantyhose? Super straight part so to fix your need alot of plucking but with that trange scalp material, I don't think it's worth it for me. The scalp pokes out at the edges because there is not enough hair on top. Wefts are shown. Bangs are thin and would need alot of styling to look good. Not that great. Underwhelmed. S-noilite Secret Wire in Human Hair Extensions 100% Real Remy Hair Extension Invisible String 16" 90g One Piece Double Drawn Fish Line Extensions for Women Gifts #60 Platinum Blonde S-noilite {'Package Dimensions': '12.4 x 7.56 x 0.59 inches; 4.23 Ounces'} So they came packed nicely but not in the s-noilite package. No logo. Just staples to a cardboard slip and wrapped in a pink bag. The hair feels nice. However, I bought the same one twice. First one was brassy in color. I was ordering the #60 in platinum. The thick version. Alot of hair. But totally brassy. So I saw the price drop so I was like okay I'll try again see if they get the color right. Nope. Still brassy and the second one was not the thick halo version. No more then 50grams. Both have double thick wires which don't hide well compared to other companies. The thin version they sent on the second ordee had clips as well. Why doesn't the thick version have clips? It would help so the ends stay close to the head. The wire was also short. So not happy based on color, difference in style sent even though I ordered same style twiced, and not package from s-noilite. My seller was us fashion outlet. I'd be sceptical to purchase from them if they are the only seller. Bought twice and neither was right color nor brand [DASHING DIVA–Nails with Big Stone]Premium Magic Press Super Slim Fit-Better Than Rose+Twinkle Corsage241/42GMC(2Different Designs 30strips+30strips in 12sizes) Dashing Diva {'Size': '33 Piece Set', 'Brand': 'Dashing Diva', 'Style': 'French', 'Coverage': 'Full Well Tips', 'Item Form': 'Gel', 'Is Discontinued By Manufacturer': 'No', 'Package Dimensions': '8.43 x 3.35 x 1.85 inches; 2.65 Ounces', 'Item model number': '8809657105388'} It's just a weak press on nail. Does not flex and form close to your own nail. Lifts very easily and will snag and pop off. Okay if you have maybe a photo shoot and your not a hand model. But don't expect to use your hand or nails without these popping off within mins of application. Thought it was like flexible nail gel. No. It's a press on nail. BOGSEA Dark Brown Wig with Bangs Long Dark Brown Wigs for Women Long Synthetic Wavy Wigs for Daily Party (24Inch,Dark Brown) BOGSEA {'Material': 'Synthetic', 'Hair Type': 'Wavy', 'Style': 'Modern', 'Brand': 'BOGSEA', 'Age Range (Description)': 'Adult', 'Package Dimensions': '11.97 x 9.09 x 2.83 inches; 10.23 Ounces', 'UPC': '701347548230'} So I felt they did a good job of hiding the weft and had alot of hair. The unit shed pretty bad just by touching it though. The hair was shiney but powder should control that. The length was there. It had one spot near the bangs that looked like someone fried it. And that would be hard to conceal. The bangs looked nicer then most but it just wasn't for me. Fake scalp also not best I've seen but concealer would probably fix that. The top had no volume and I don't mean amount of hair. It was slicked down really tight. I tried to shake it a bit with my fingers to see if it would gain some life but it didn't, plus a bunch of hair fell out. This super flat look near the fake scalp and with a mid part that cannot be moved is just gonna make me look like the Amish. I would look at this company again if they had a unit without the bangs and maybe a more flexible part. A mini front lace would probably help. Very flat top. Some fried pieces under the wig.
profile:
**Updated User Profile Summary:**

- **Hair Care Preferences**: The user prefers high-quality hair extensions and wigs, consistently focusing on the quality, appearance, and fit. They have recently expressed some disappointment regarding the performance of synthetic wigs, particularly issues with shedding and styling limitations.

- **Color and Aesthetic**: The user favors platinum blonde shades and is exploring golden brown tones. Their commitment to achieving accurate color representation remains a priority in their purchases.

- **Product Characteristics**: Emphasis on reliability and compatibility with natural hair continues to shape the user's purchasing decisions. Recent feedback highlights ongoing challenges with product quality, particularly the need for volume and flexibility in styling options.

- **Value for Money**: Value for money is important to the user, as they expect products to meet specific quality standards. Mixed experiences with products that fall short in performance have intensified their scrutiny.

- **Care Instructions**: The user actively seeks care tips to prolong the durability and maintenance of their hair products, aligning with their quality commitment.

- **Makeup Preferences**: User-friendly makeup options remain a priority, especially concerning application techniques, such as false eyelashes.

- **Nail Product Experiences**: They are inclined towards high-quality, flexible nail products, reflecting a broader preference for reliability across cosmetic categories.

Overall, the user values dependable, high-quality products in hair, makeup, and nails while remaining open to exploring new styles and aesthetics. They seek products that offer both functionality and aesthetic appeal without compromising on quality.
